name: Fabulous Beef Tenderloin
author: Debbie Wright
summary: This beef tenderloin will melt in your mouth.  We've had it for both of our Christmas dinners this year (2 families) and got RAVE reviews from everyone.  Hard to believe it's so easy to prepare!
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Place roast into a shallow, glass baking dish
Pour soy sauce and melted butter over the tenderloin

Bake in preheated oven for 10 minutes, then turn the roast over, and continue cooking 35 to 40 minutes, basting occasionally until the internal temperature of the roast is at 140 degrees F (60 degrees C) for medium
Or, cook to your desired degree of doneness
Let meat rest for 10 to 15 minutes before slicing
